title: tools/autograd/gen_variable_type.py still special casing functions with _out/_forward in their name
body_html:
Relevant code:

    def skip_function(declaration):
        name = declaration['name']
        return name.endswith('_out') or '_forward' in name

I haven't tried just replacing this with return False and seeing what happens yet.

body:
Relevant code:

```
    def skip_function(declaration):
        name = declaration['name']
        return name.endswith('_out') or '_forward' in name
```

I haven't tried just replacing this with `return False` and seeing what happens yet.
